channel.title: Longform
channel.description: The best non-fiction, past and present.

item.title: The 1925 Cave Rescue That Captivated the Nation
item.dc:creator: editors
item.description: America’s first viral story was of a Kentucky cave explorer, Floyd Collins, and the epic effort to rescue him.
item.content:encoded:
America’s first viral story was of a Kentucky cave explorer, Floyd Collins, and the epic effort to rescue him.

Lucas Reilly | Mental Floss | Jul 2018
[Full Story]

item.title: Hunting the Con Queen of Hollywood: Who's the "Crazy Evil Genius" Behind a Global Racket?
item.dc:creator: editors
item.description:
She calls claiming to be Amy Pascal, Kathleen Kennedy, or some other powerful woman in entertainment. She knows personal details about her mark as well as the woman she is impersonating.

She offers work, then sends them—photographers, make-up artists, soldiers—around the world to bilk them out of modest amounts of cash.
item.content:encoded:
She calls claiming to be Amy Pascal, Kathleen Kennedy, or some other powerful woman in entertainment. She knows personal details about her mark as well as the woman she is impersonating.

She offers work, then sends them—photographers, make-up artists, soldiers—around the world to bilk them out of modest amounts of cash.

Scott Johnson | The Hollywood Reporter | Jul 2018
[Full Story]

item.title: Longform Podcast #301: Bryan Fogel
item.dc:creator: editors
item.description:
Bryan Fogel is the Oscar-winning director of Icarus.

“But there was a long period of time also that none of us were really thinking so much about the film. It was really that we were in a real world crisis. Gregory's life was essentially in my hands.”

Thanks to MailChimp, Read This Summer, Google Play, and Stitcher Premium for sponsoring this week's episode.
item.content:encoded:
Bryan Fogel is the Oscar-winning director of Icarus.

“But there was a long period of time also that none of us were really thinking so much about the film. It was really that we were in a real world crisis. Gregory's life was essentially in my hands.”

Thanks to MailChimp, Read This Summer, Google Play, and Stitcher Premium for sponsoring this week's episode.

[Listen]

item.title: The Untold Story of Syria's Antifa Platoon
item.dc:creator: editors
item.description: Rojava becomes the Spanish Civil War of modern times for a ragtag group of leftists revolutionaries.
item.content:encoded:
Rojava becomes the Spanish Civil War of modern times for a ragtag group of leftists revolutionaries.

Seth Harp | Rolling Stone | Jul 2018
[Full Story]

item.title: Attack on Skull Island
item.dc:creator: editors
item.description: After the blockbuster success of Kong: Skull Island, director Jordan Vogt-Roberts fled Hollywood to live the expat dream life in Vietnam. Then, one night at a Saigon club, he was brutally beaten by a mysterious mob of gangsters. Who were these monsters? Soon, he began directing something entirely different—an international hunt for the men who nearly killed him.
item.content:encoded:
After the blockbuster success of Kong: Skull Island, director Jordan Vogt-Roberts fled Hollywood to live the expat dream life in Vietnam. Then, one night at a Saigon club, he was brutally beaten by a mysterious mob of gangsters. Who were these monsters? Soon, he began directing something entirely different—an international hunt for the men who nearly killed him.

Max Marshall | GQ | Jul 2018
[Full Story]
